definition: numeral 2 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
(med) retractile testicle/infatuation inducing/pee inducing (of alcohol)/(neologism) to be sexually attracted/to have the hots for sb

sentences.english: Objective To probe the nephron spring surgery for renal neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估保留肾单位手术治疗肾肿瘤的效果。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the nephron spring surgery for renal neoplasms.
sentences.chinese: 目的评估保留肾单位手术治疗肾肿瘤的效果。

sentences.english: Angiomyolipoma was also found in the contralateral kidney.
sentences.chinese: 血管平滑肌脂肪瘤也发现对侧肾。

sentences.english: In addition, the necrosis of spleen, bursa of Fabricius, thymus and convoluted tubular epithelia of kidney was seen.
sentences.chinese: 肾曲小管上皮细胞严重变性坏死等病理变化。

sentences.english: For example, the meridian pertaining to the kidney is named the kidney meridian, and the rest may be deduced by analogy.
sentences.chinese: 例如，属于肾的经脉命名为肾经，其余由此类推。

sentences.english: ConclusionAtorvastation can be used for early renal damage in patients with essential hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨阿托伐他汀对高血压早期肾损害的影响。

sentences.english: There are 4 haemodialysis machines to cater to the 6 patients at present.
sentences.chinese: 目前该中心共有6名病黎在此洗肾。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the therapeutic efficacy of diclofenac sodium suppositories in renal colic caused by calculus.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解双氯芬酸钠栓剂对结石性肾绞痛的治疗效果。

sentences.english: The treatment should be nephrectomy or enucleation of the tumor.
sentences.chinese: 治疗应行肾部分切除或肿瘤剜除术。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the experiences of simultaneous kidney-pancreas transplantation (SKPT) with enteric drainage of pancreatic secretion (ED).
sentences.chinese: 目的总结肠腔引流式胰肾联合移植围手术期处理经验。

sentences.english: Conclusion The ultrasonic guidance automatic biopsy method should are spreaded.
sentences.chinese: 结论超声引导自动肾穿刺活组织检查应推广应用。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the content of heavy metals in Nephrolepis cordifolia increased significantly.
sentences.chinese: 同时肾蕨对各种重金属离子吸收总量也显著提高。

sentences.english: Conclusion Renal scintigraphy is a noninvasive and effective examination in diagnosis of RVH.
sentences.chinese: 结论肾动态显像检查有助于RVH的诊断。

sentences.english: The key function is enriching lung and kidney, beneficing pneuma.
Kidney essence is helpful for promoting the growth of skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 肾的精气有促进骨骼生长的作用。

sentences.english: Calciphylaxis is becoming increasingly common in patients with normal renal and parathyroid function.
sentences.chinese: 钙过敏症越来越常见于肾和甲状腺功能正常的患者。

definition: five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
spleen and stomach (digestive organs in TCM)/preferences/one's taste (e.g. in literature)
(TCM) the three truncal cavities (thoracic, abdominal and pelvic), known as the "triple heater" or "San Jiao"
